BasicDetails.Description: Just Reduced! A pristine contemporary on a secluded wooded site The interior was designed by the team Patino and Wolf who are known for their cutting edge minimalist designs and pioneering the use of industrial materials.. The home is characterized by sleek lines, high cathedral ceilings and large windows which bring in the light and beauty of the bucolic setting.. House & Garden ran a six page feature on the home at the time, and it looks very much the same today.

BROOKVILLE, This Gated Oasis Is One Of A Kind Residence Situated On 6 Lush Acres. Once In A Decade An Incredible Estate Becomes Available & This Is That Moment. Bold & Contemporary, Yet Traditionally Elegant, This Masterpiece Of Design, Space & Comfort Affords A Lifestyle Of Luxury. The Grand Entry Leads To An Indoor Salt Water Pool As The Central Focus Of The Home.

Boasting 6000 Square Feet Of Elegant Living Space On 2 Massive Levels This Post Modern Updated Loft Style Colonial Provides The Ultimate Backdrop For Large Scale Entertaining As Well As Optimal Comfort For Family And Guests With 6 Bedrooms 5 Full Baths,1 Half Bath And Sprawling Living/Recreation Spaces.Resort Setting With Heated Pool, Waterfalls,Hot Tub,Sauna,Tennis Court

In prime Soho, Residence 5B at 10 Sullivan Street spans 2,823 interior square feet with 1,391 square feet of exterior square feet. Two exquisitely landscaped terraces directly off of the great room and bedrooms capture sunrise views of historic Soho to the east and magnificent sunsets to the west. Superbly finished by renowned designer Joseph D'Urso, this 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home with 2 terraces and custom gas fireplace defines contemporary elegance.

A formal entry foyer leads to a gallery, ideal for showcasing art, then to a magnificent great room with 11' ceilings and a custom finished gas fireplace with a soaring slab of Dalmatta marble in the living room. The open Poliform kitchen with center island breakfast bar is appointed with handsome walnut cabinetry and Lagano marble slab countertops and backsplash, with top of the line appliances by Miele and Viking, plus a SubZero wine cooler.

The private master suite offers a generous walk-in closet, access to the east terrace and a massive, windowed master bath. This master bath features walls and floors of Dolomite marble, a custom vanity in pietra cardosa stone, Lefroy Brooks fixtures, a freestanding soaking tub, separate steam shower, and radiant heated floors.

Two additional bedrooms are generously proportioned -- each offering abundant light and views west -one with private access to the terrace. Modern conveniences abound, including a Savant home automation system and motorized window shades, and radiant heated flooring throughout. The sumptuous palette includes oil-rubbed Danish oak floors and oversized industrial-style windows. The outdoor gas grills, powder room, and custom laundry room finished in mahogany complete this magnificent residence.

10 Sullivan, designed by acclaimed architect Cary Tamarkin, is SoHo's newest luxury boutique condominium in one of Manhattan's most sought after neighborhoods.

Introducing Residence 11: This architecturally distinguished 3-bedroom, 3.5 bathroom residence features signature eight-and-a-half-foot-tall weight and chain double-hung windows in the living room and master bedroom. The windowed open kitchen offers a culinary island for informal entertaining. Additional enhancements include triple exposures, eleven-foot ceilings in the living room and bedrooms, a split configuration of the secondary bedrooms, and a master suite with two walk-in wardrobes.

Each individually tailored residence, designed by BKSK Architects, is appointed with exquisite finishes. The Parisian foyer with a paneled entry door is a prelude to the seamless, flowing layout with a loft-like great room. Timelessly stylish, the open chef's kitchen features custom millwork cabinetry with leather-wrapped Tanner's Craft nickel hardware. The fully integrated Gaggenau appliance package of refrigerator, freezer, five-burner gas cooktop, wall ovens, dishwasher and microwave is framed by honed Zebrino countertops with a glazed brick tile backsplash. Reflective of the distinctively detailed façade, each bathroom offers an elegant composition of materials and textures. The luxurious, five-fixture master bath, draped in Volakas honed marble, features radiant heated floors with a Bardiglio mosaic border. The teardrop chandelier illuminates the custom oak vanity and the marble-framed bathtub. The defining aesthetic element of the secondary bath is the terrazzo floor. The incandescent powder room exhibits custom marble mosaic floors and a Waterworks "Henry? vanity. All baths feature Lefroy Brooks fittings.

This beloved Cobble Hill landmark, with a French Renaissance limestone and iron spot brick façade, is being restored and transformed into an intimate collection of exquisitely crafted residences paired with a first class, full-service amenity package. The arrival at this restored masterpiece is concierge attended and appointed with painted mirror glass walls, a restored coffered ceiling, and patterned marble floors that echo the façade detailing. The two-level amenity suite includes a paneled billiards library with a fireplace, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and a yoga atelier. The landscaped roof terrace soars above the historical brownstone neighborhood, which offers views of the harbor, bridges, and the Statue of Liberty. À la carte enhancements include indoor parking and private storage.

The Parisian flair of this spacious one-bedroom home is enhanced by the loft-like proportions of the great room and the generous, nearly 13-foot ceilings in the living spaces, and the corner layout allows for dual window exposures. Entertain in contemporary style with a gracious oversized and windowed kitchen and a thirteen-foot custom culinary peninsula. The private master bedroom suite features triple exposures, dual walk-in wardrobes, and a windowed five-fixture master bath. The residence is enhanced by ceiling heights that reach up to ten feet, nine inches in the living room and bedrooms.

Each individually tailored residence, designed by BKSK Architects, is appointed with exquisite finishes. Reflective of the distinctively detailed façade, each bathroom offers an elegant composition of materials and textures. The teardrop chandelier illuminates the custom oak vanity and the marble-framed bathtub. The defining aesthetic element of the secondary bath is the terrazzo floor. The incandescent powder room exhibits custom marble mosaic floors and a Waterworks "Henry? vanity. All baths feature Lefroy Brooks fittings.

This is not an offering. The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from sponsor. File No. CD16-0060. Sponsor: FPG CH 350 Henry, LLC. Property address: 100 Amity Street, Brooklyn, New York 11201. Equal Housing Opportunity.

Welcome to Williamsburg's most desirable condo buildings to live in Olive Park! This C line unit is located on one of the highest floors in this building with an interior of 1013 square feet making this the largest 2 bed/2 bath & comes with an additional 175 square foot northeastern facing private corner balcony. Since this is a corner unit you get multiple scenic views! On the northern side you can see a full view of the Manhattan skyline and from the eastern side you can see beautiful Cooper park! If you love to host family & friend gatherings in your home then this is the perfect place for you! With high end kitchen upgrades and plenty of space to host in the huge living room and/or on the outdoor balcony! Olive Park's luxury 5 star resort amenities includes an indoor heated all natural salt water swimming pool, spa, Jacuzzi, sauna and much more! It's located right across the street from newly renovated Cooper Park that includes a dog run, running track, children's playground, adult exercise stations, tennis, handball, volleyball & basketball courts, skateboard area, exercise classes by donation. Interior features: Junior bedroom has a full skyline view & both of the bedrooms come with it's own California custom build walk in closets (this is an added feature), 9 foot tall high ceilings, oak hardwood floors, marble bathroom & kitchen, a Grohe Minta kitchen faucet along with an Insinkeratoro food waste disposer (this is another added feature) & state of the line Bosch stove, microwave & refrigerator, rainforest shower & huge soak in tub, build in dishwasher with a optional washer/dryer combo unit. With a total of 14 California windows you get excellent quality air & light in this unit. These two elements are essential for good feng shui energy in your home. Exterior features: 24 hour doorman security & concierge, indoor heated swimming pool, spa, Jacuzzi, sauna, state of the line gym, welcoming guest reception area that includes comfy couches, fireplace & pool table, common laundry room, private deeded storage unit, common cold storage for groceries, recreational room that you can privately reserve to host gatherings in, common roof top cabana with Manhattan Skyline views and a relaxing mediation garden with reflecting pond & bbq. To top it off this building has a pet spa so dogs and cats are welcome! Community features: a very highly rated Montessori pre-K school and for a fee weekly baby swimming & music classes. Neighborhood features: L train is 2 blocks away from Graham Ave or take the G train which is a short 10 minute walk to the Lorimer Street station, short 10 minute bus ride to the J, M,Z trains and close to award winning restaurants, coffee/bakery shops & grocery stores. Brooklyn Steel a new concert venue that is close by for you music lovers too. RE taxes are currently only $44.00 a month that has a tax abatement with an estimated 16 years left! There's a 2017 assessment in place that the seller will pay at closing so no need to worry about paying any additional costs on top of your monthly hoa fees when buying into this building! Some amazing optional add ons: purchasing a private rooftop cabana with a Manhattan Skyline or a beautiful Park view. Note: Indoor parking spot that comes with this unit is optional. Please reach out to Sandy Abbas for a private viewing today!

Museum quality renovation just completed of this two bedroom with two full baths on the best block in SoHo. Enter off of your private key-locked elevator and into a stunning living room with towering ceilings, incredible proportions and enormous windows letting tons of natural light pour in throughout the day. Wide plank floors, newly installed and perfectly finished, lead you to a large dining area easily accommodating ten. The open chefs kitchen has custom cabinets, stone counters and stainless steel appliances. As you walk through the space youll notice the incredible detail including custom floor to ceiling solid core doors and custom closets. The east facing bedrooms are flooded with light and are pin-drop quiet. The master is literally fit for a King with ample space for a separate seating area. Your custom dressing room leads to a five piece spa-like master bath. Located on cobblestone paved Greene between Prince and Spring, the block is literally one of the best in SoHo. The building is a great example of Cast Iron architecture. Amazing restaurants and some of the worlds best shopping and entertainment are right outside.

Views as far as the eye can see from this spectacular three bedroom home with towering ceilings and floor to ceiling windows, three full baths and private laundry, all in a spectacular full-service Tribeca condominium. Facing south-east with fantastic light throughout the day, this barely lived in home is showroom perfect.

Enter into a large entry gallery and be ushered into the incredible corner living room with 180 degree views overlooking all of Tribeca from Midtown to New York Harbor and everything in between. Chef's will be at home in the expertly designed Bulthaup kitchen with stone counters and integrated Miele and Sub-Zero appliances.

Your enormous master suite faces east, with two walk-in closets, and easily accommodates a king sized bed with adjacent sitting area. The five piece master bath with side by side sinks, glass enclosed shower and extra deep soaking tub is the perfect escape from the busy city. The separate secondary bedrooms are equally generous and face south with exceptional light throughout the day.

101 Warren is an award winning example of the marriage between classic details and modern styling. Its limestone, steel and glass facade showcase the impeccable detail architect Skidmore, Owings and Merrill is known more. Amenities include twenty-four doorman, resident lounge, fifth floor Pine forest and private fitness center.

Whole Foods, Soul Cycle, Bed, Bath and Beyond and Barnes and Noble are right downstairs. Brookfield Place, Le District and Eataly are each minutes from your front door. The 1/2/3/A/C/E are nearby making getting anywhere in the city as easy as can be. Fantastic restaurants and Washington Market, Duane and Hudson River Parks are each right outside.

Located in the "BLUE" condominium, one of the most iconic, ground up new developments on the Lower East Side, this beautiful, sun-drenched, and well-appointed two bedroom two bathroom residence offers view, light, and location windows. Designed by star-architect Bernard Tschumi and built to GREEN standards with sustainable and energy efficient materials, this home offers a hypnotic and unforgettable design that is evident upon one's arrival. Behind the unique, angled glass facade are spectacular open city views and western sunsets, visible from double exposures and floor-to-ceiling privacy-tinted windows in every room. The apartment contains a pristine, stainless steel chef's kitchen, equipped with professional-grade Viking appliances including wine refrigeration. The master bedroom is well proportioned and includes a large walk-in closet, as well as a bathroom that is unrivaled in light and design. This bathroom offers an oversized, windowed, floor to ceiling glass shower stall with a rain shower set alongside dual sinks, all of which are complimented by a river pebble tile detail. The second bedroom offers phenomenal light with dramatic views, and the second bathroom provides a deep Zuma soaking tub, Duravit fixtures, and excellent storage. The exclusive "BLUE? condominium also includes deeded, secure, in-building storage, 8,000 square feet of terraces overlooking the Williamsburg Bridge and downtown skyline, Fios internet, Fresh Direct refrigerators, a bike room, and a full-time doorman and concierge. Located 50 feet from the F-J-M-Z trains and just down the block from Schillers, this home is at the epicenter of one of New York's most dynamic neighborhoods. There is an ongoing assessment in the amount of $254 that is currently in effective.

New Two Story Center Hall Colonial On Quiet Street Mid Block Location, Custom Built Modern Style Kitchen With Island/Microwave-Drawer/Quartz-Counter-Top/Stainless Steel Appliances/Open To Family Den/Overlooks New Large Deck And Spacious Backyard, Laundry Room On First Floor. Herricks Sd, Close To Hwy, Restaurants And Other Amenities. Taxes To Be Assessed And Determined.

Mint condition two bedroom loft flooded with southern light. When you step into the apartment you are immediately greeted by the oversized arched windows, 11 foot pressed tin ceilings, modern walnut paneling, an abundance of storage, castiron columns and luxurious dark wood floors. The modern kitchen features beautiful cabinetry, granite counters, Subzero refrigerator, Thermador range, dishwasher and plenty of room for entertaining. You may relax in the spacious bathroom and deep soaking tub. The apartment features a Miele washer and dryer, custom lighting and more. Amenities include stunning private roof deck and community garden, bicycle room, laundry room, storage and FiOS.

Sprawling two bedroom loft with beautiful tin ceilings, six over-sized south-facing windows, and in-unit washer-dryer, in a boutique elevator building on the edge of Chelsea and super-trendy NoMad. Upon entry, you're welcomed home into a massively airy open loft space, with nearly 11-foot-high tin ceilings and flooded with spectacular southern sunlight. Similarly spacious are your two king-sized bedrooms, and large open kitchen complete with Viking stove, breakfast bar, and plentiful cabinets and counters. A large lofted storage space above the bathroom has ample room for luggage, seasonal items, and other big pieces you'd like to keep out of the way. 107 West 25th Street is a well-maintained 25-unit coop in a circa 1900s Garment District loft building with stunning community roof garden, secure video intercom, fob keyed elevators, storage, bike room, laundry room, and Verizon FiOS optionality. One block from Madison Square Park, and minutes from the Chelsea Gallery District, The High Line, and Hudson River parks. Fairway, Whole Foods, Eataly, world-class shopping, and some of NYC's most noteworthy restaurants and trendsetting hotels are also at your doorstep. And with the F/M/1/R/W/6/C/E/PATH trains all within a stone's throw, you're perfectly positioned to easily travel anywhere, in or out of NYC.

Newly renovated traditional house located in East Hampton near the village and ocean beaches. This desirable village lane offers convenience yet the privacy of large size lots. New top of the line kitchen, open floor plan with large living room, sun room, and dining room. The house offers 6 bedrooms, 5 and a half baths. There are 4 fireplaces in the house a finished lower level and a wine cellar. Set in the beautiful grounds outdoors is a heated gunite pool and pool house. Detached three -car garage. Enjoy this exceptional Hamptons village south property!

Beautifully renovated six bedroom townhouse designed in the mid 1800's by one of the most important architects of the day, JAMES RENWICK,JR. He is best know for his design of St. Patrick's Cathedral on Fifth Avenue.Well located on a street which has been called "The Most Beautiful Street in the Village".It also has been home to many famous people ,one being the prominent architect,Stanford White. This outstanding house combines the preservation of original detail and a complete renovation which allows for the luxury and convenience of today'smodern world. Features include central air and heat,video,intercom,security and alarm system. Designer furnished totally turnkey at no extra charge. BUYER need only to bring tooth brush and personal belongings. Real Estate Tax/annual $21,692.

Breathtakingly beautiful, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath apartment in the handsome full-service prewar cooperative, 1148 Fifth Avenue, directly across the street from Central Park. This grand classic 8-room home has undergone a meticulous gut renovation, incorporating the finest materials and finishes while preserving the many charming prewar details. A gracious foyer spills into a long gallery hall with a wall of built-in shelving and an arched open doorway, welcoming you into an ambience of elegance. Gorgeous herringbone floors throughout, high beamed ceilings, crown moldings and oversized windows on triple exposures complement the wonderful loft-like open-plan design created by combining the spacious living and dining rooms. Entertain guests sipping cocktails around the stunning wood-burning fireplace with a marble mantle, then continue the conversation in the dining area over a sit-down meal. The large windowed professional chef's kitchen adorned with marble countertops/backsplash and stainless steel appliances offers a separate breakfast area with banquette for enjoying morning coffee and casual fare. Two staff rooms sit conveniently off the kitchen with a bathroom in between. The sunny master bedroom positioned privately off the foyer offers 2 generously-sized closets and a lovely en-suite bath. Two additional large bedrooms off the gallery face east share a full bath and feature ample closets. A washer dryer and central air conditioning optimize your comfort. Built in 1923 and designed by famed architect J.E.R. Carpenter, 1148 Fifth Avenue is a sought-after, pet-friendly residence on Fifth between 95th and 96th Street. Amenities include a full-time doorman, gym, laundry room, bike room and additional private storage.

Breath taking Central Park and reservoir views from this 5th avenue apartment perched on a high floor. Bright and sunny southern and western exposure that highlights Manhattan Skyline. Classic 8- room residence boasts high 9.5 foot beamed ceilings and original herringbone oak floors. Currently a 3 bedroom, convertible to a 4 bedroom. Combination library and living room offers sprawling 23 foot wide space and a wood burning fireplace. Elegant 28 foot long gallery welcomes guests into your private oasis above it all. Linger on the window seat in your corner master bedroom and enjoy the change of seasons in Central Park. Spacious Smallbone kitchen and butlers pantry. Entertain dinner party guests in one of the few dining rooms with views of both the Park and the Manhattan skyline or divide into an informal dining room and media room. This rarely available residence was built in 1926 by the foremost luxury apartment architect J.E.R. Carpenter. A full-service doorman cooperative features complimentary fitness center, full-sized storage unit, bike room and laundry facilities. Two playgrounds, tennis courts and sports fields across the street in Central Park, where you can walk your dog, run or bike. 50% Financing.

NEW TO THE MARKET, rarely available spacious south facing one bedroom apartment on the Upper East Side. This apartment offers Unobstructed City Views, a wide galley kitchen and windowed bathroom, move in ready or small renovations to make this apartment as your own for an investor, end user or simply both. Tenant currently in place until December 31st 2017. Please call today for a private showing, 24 hours notice is required. The Trafalgar House Condominium is located between Park and Lexington Avenues, the building is close to Central Park, the main entrance to the Reservoir, main subway lines, crosstown buses, and Museum Mile. Enjoy everything the Upper East Side has to offer restaurants, shopping, convenience.

Truly Special 4 Br, 2.5 Spacious Colonial In South Oakdale. Gorgeous Shade Gardens & Specimen Plantings Create An Abundance Of Privacy. Vacation In Your Own Backyard Relaxing On The Custom Brick Patio W/Awning, Wood Floors, Library W/Built-In Shelving, Wood Burning Fireplace, 2+ Car Side Entry Garage, This Splendor In The Grass Is Beautifully Maintained. A Must See!

BEST E 60s TOWNHOUSE + GORGEOUS GARDENS AT $13,250,000 ($2,366/SQ FT)

Link to electronic brochure: http://epaper.webtopsolutions.com/epaper.asp?id=376942

A perfect jewel situated on one of the best townhouse blocks on the Upper East Side, this 20' wide elegant, recently renovated triple mint five-story home is a perfect blend of traditional and contemporary. Every detail in every room has been selected with the greatest care and attention to quality and comfort. Likewise every tree, bush and flower in its extraordinary gardens and terraces. Perfection in approximately 5,600 interior sq. feet and 2,000 exterior sq. feet.

The beautiful flow, well-thought out design and layouts inside and outside, exquisite one-of-a kind highest quality custom finishes and fixtures are the home's hallmarks. Every modern convenience includes Lutron home automation and security systems, 12-zone radiant floor heating throughout, elevator, emergency generator, 6 working fireplaces, finished basement, exercise room, closets galore. There are 11 rooms, 3 to 5 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 3 powder rooms, chef's gourmet eat-in kitchen, media room and library, elegant formal living room, separate full dining room, and cozy den.

Special features: marble master bath spans the full width of the house; custom leather finished marble flooring from entry to garden; beamed ceiling library and media room separated by two large doors that form a full wall, and a glass-walled two-story atrium that brings light in from the roof skylight.

The garden's magnificent birch and maple trees provide a quiet, contemplative retreat, and the perfect space to entertain both small and large gatherings. The fully planted rooftop terrace and other of the home's planters show nature's prettiest bounty throughout the year.

At $13,250,000 ($2,366/sq ft), this stunning home is one of the best buys on the market in the prime E 60s between Park and Lexington Avenues.

SHOWINGS BEGIN SEPT.19th. Come home to your full floor oasis in the heart of Chelsea! This condominium residence, in excellent condition, has three to four bedrooms, 3.5 baths, a den and an enormous, private terrace. Enter from the private elevator directly into your approximately 2,980 sf home. A well-designed circulation pattern allows the apartment to flow in all directions. Large rooms with ceiling heights up to 9.5' lend a feeling of airy spaciousness to the home. The generous living/dining area is naturally bright thanks to the floor to ceiling windows that face the south terrace. Adjacent to the living room is a windowed den/office. Open to, yet separate from the living room, the chef's kitchen boasts hardwood and glass Snaidero cabinets along with professional Miele appliances and a large walk-in pantry. The marble counter tops feature a beautiful, custom edge detail. From the living/dining room there are double access doors to a magical 1500 sf landscaped terrace that enjoys a large seating area, a raised dining platform, a barbecue area and a charming water feature! All the bedrooms enjoy privacy due to their split configuration. The spacious master bedroom has lovely tree-line views and a large en-suite, marble and glass bathroom with a large soaking tub, a separate stall shower and a double sink vanity. There are two additional bedrooms with the possibility of a fourth bedroom. The secondary baths are a sophisticated combination of Artistic tiles and honed marble floors. Bathrooms have radiant heat floors. Additional amenities include abundant storage, a large laundry room, central air conditioning and handsome hardwood floors. All this contained in a Gold LEED Certified building makes for a very special home.

Prime Waterfront Home In The Heart Of Riverhead 5 Minutes From The Railroad, Expressway, Tanger Outlets, Restaurants, The Aquariam And More. This .76 Acre Oasis On Merritts Pond Also Offers Easy Access To Vineyards And Beaches. 4 Bedrooms, 2.5 Baths, Basement, Fireplace, Deck, And Room For A Pool. Riverhead: The Gateway To The Hamptons And The North Fork!

This exceptional 3,726 square foot 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence with library, four-way exposures, and a 153 square foot private terrace occupies an entire floor at 135 West 52nd Street, the coveted condominium situated in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, expertly conceived by esteemed CetraRuddy to reflect the glamour and energy of New York City.

Rich finishes and luxurious design elements abound, including rift-sawn 5 inch-wide plank white oak flooring throughout, while generous proportions and abundant light through massive exposures that offer views of Central Park and the Hudson River create a spacious, open feel. Keyed elevators open to a private vestibule with separate service and primary entrances. Through the residential entry, a massive 50-foot wide Great Room awaits, the southern wall lined almost entirely in glass for incredible natural light and quintessential City views. Within the space, multiple living and dining areas create the ideal setting for gracious entertaining and luxurious daily living alike, while elegant touches include a beautiful fireplace enclosed in floor-to-ceiling marble. Adjacent to the great room at the eastern end, opposite the wet bar, custom Rimadesio white back-painted glass sliding doors reveal a sumptuous Library, wrapped on two sides by south- and east-facing exposures.

At the west end, the great room flows into the gracious eat-in chef's Kitchen, where glass lines the southwest corner, setting the perfect scene for intimate dining. The elegantly appointed Molteni kitchen offers Italian walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry, Calacatta Vision marble countertops, and top-of-the-line Miele appliances that include dual dishwashers, a built-in icemaker, coffee maker, and wine refrigerator. A powder room and utility closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this truly outstanding residence.

The private Master Suite promises a luxurious daily retreat, where a sprawling, light-filled master bedroom opens to a 153 square foot private terrace, the ultimate setting in which to unwind. Beyond the dual closets are two Master Baths with radiant heat flooring, one with commode and beautiful custom vanity and the other with a north-facing window, custom vanity with ample counter space, a freestanding Kaldewei soaking tub, and private water closet joined together by a shared shower. A powder room and utility closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this truly outstanding residence.

IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY! Gracious 2,121 square foot, three bedroom, 3 bath residence with Northern, Eastern, and Southern exposures features a huge 420 square foot private terrace evokes a modern sensibility and paramount comfort. Interior features include rift-sawn 5 inch wide white solid oak flooring, exposures on three sides, and custom Rimadesio back-painted white glass sliding walls. An elegant foyer leads to a gracious corner Great Room that offers Southern and Eastern exposures.

The Great Room flows seamlessly into an Open Chef's Kitchen, creating a perfect layout for entertaining. The Kitchen features Dada Italian Walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry, and a Dada high-gloss white lacquer island complete with a speed oven and wine refrigerator. Calacatta Vision marble counter tops and top-of-the-line Miele appliances finish of this stunning kitchen. The beautiful Master Suite includes a large walk-in-closet as well as a dressing room.

The Master Bath includes radiant-heated, Siberian White tile floors, custom white, back-painted glass vanity with a polished nickel frame and Siberian Mink stone countertop, Fantini Venezia wall-mounted polished nickel fixtures, custom recessed medicine cabinet a soaking tub and a stall shower. The second and third bedrooms each feature en suite bathrooms, appointed with Calacatta marble tile walls, custom Watermark polished nickel wall-mounted tub and shower fittings, and polished Bianco Dolomiti countertops, complete with white ceramic under mount Nantucket sinks. A side-by-side washer and dryer by Miele finish of this remarkable residence.

IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY! The exceptional three-bedroom, three-and-one-half bath Duplex Penthouse comprises 2,601 interior square feet with 306 square feet of private terrace space as well as a stunning quadruple exposures and two floors, all in the very heart of Midtown Manhattan at 135 W 52nd Street.

Soaring ceilings, custom white back painted glass cabinetry, and an exquisite palette of luxurious design elements create a sophisticated sensibility in this stunning residence. Triple exposures bathe the Dining/ Family Room in natural sunlight while rift-sawn 5-wide plank white oak flooring creates warmth and texture that extends into the adjoining open Chef's Kitchen.

Molteni Italian walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry with bronze satin mirror detailing, Calacatta Vision polished marble countertop, Watermark fixtures, and premiere appliances by Miele adorn the open kitchen. Beyond, a glass-wrapped, double-height Great Room offers an ideal setting for daily living and entertaining alike, and Southern- and Eastern exposures provide warm natural light and stunning city skyline views.

At the East end of the first level lies the gracious Library, featuring an en suite full bath with custom Watermark polished nickel shower fittings and Calacatta honed marble tile flooring, the eastern wall of the Library is made entirely of glass and leads out to one of the residence's spacious private terraces. A secondary bedroom with en suite bath and a Powder Room expertly appointed with custom walnut vanity with a polished nickel metal frame and Calacatta Fab polished marble counter tops complete this level.

The upstairs private Master Suite promises a luxurious daily retreat, where a sprawling, light-filled master bedroom opens to a 153 square foot private terrace, the ultimate setting in which to unwind. Beyond the dual closets are two Master Baths with radiant heat flooring, one with commode and beautiful custom vanity and the other with a north-facing window, custom vanity with ample counter space, a freestanding Kaldewei soaking tub, and private water closet joined together by a shared shower. A Utility Closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this beautiful residence.

3 Bedroom Colonial, Lovely Updated Kitchen, Large Den, Immaculate Condition. Near Shopping, Lirr, School District 14. Custom Master Closets, Wood Burning Stove In Den. Central Station Alarms, Automatic Sprinklers, Fire And Smoke Detectors, Access To Attic. Low Taxes

This Sprawling Hi Ranch Is Located In A Quiet Development. Hard Wood Floors Throughout The Main Level. Newly Painted, New Burner And Hot Water Heater. Legal Acc. Apartment With Renewal Of Permit. New Kitchen In Apartment. Lareg 2 Car Garage! Large Private Fully Fenced Property. Taxes With Star 8274.87

Stylish and efficiently-designed Junior 1BR apartment at the full-service Chadwin House in Chelsea! A welcoming entry foyer leads to a large living room featuring strip hardwood floors, recessed lighting and a separate dining area. With the apartment facing out the back of the building, the ambience is peaceful and quiet and the west facing windows let in great natural light. Other highlights include a galley kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, a separate windowed sleeping area and a neatly-remodeled bathroom with a pedestal sink and oversized linen closet. You won't be short of storage space with ample closets. Built in 1962 and converted to a condominium in 1985, the 7-story Chadwin House is a desirable living destination with a 24-hour doorman, live-in super, laundry room, storage, and low common charges. The location in the heart of Chelsea on Seventh Ave between 18th and 19th Streets is exceptional, near Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, Chelsea Market, Rubin Museum of Art, The High Line, Union Square and many local dog parks (yes pets are allowed!). For a bite out, Scarpetta, Buddakan, Del Posto and other restaurants are minutes away, as are numerous gyms and shops. The 1 train is on the corner, and just a few blocks south is 14th Street with the 1, 2, 3, L, F, M, A, C & E lines as well as the PATH. Pied-a-terres, parents buying for children, co-purchasing, gifting, guarantors and subletting are ok.

Bespoke Chelsea Live/Work Condo Loft features enormous south facing living room, giant bedrooms, towering ceilings, huge windows, gourmet open kitchen with externally vented hood, private laundry and a large separate windowed work space perfect for architect, designer, family office, tech, finance, etc. Very affordable monthlies! 144 is a well maintained discrete condominium with two large elevators, full-time superintendent perfectly located in Chelsea, steps from NoMad and the Flatiron District. Amazing restaurants, nightlife and entertainment options are right outside. Please note there is an assessment of $670 per month through the end of the year.

Mint condition two bedroom two bath floor-thru in historic townhouse with open modern kitchen, hardwood floors and Italian marble fireplace. This newly renovated home features an open chefs kitchen with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, granite counter and dishwasher. A generous dining area is perfect for hosting friends or a quiet dinner for two. The generous living area is perfect for spreading out after a long day and curling up with a good book. Your master suite faces south over manicured gardens with amazing light pouring in throughout the day and absolute peace and quiet. .An ensuite bath is the perfect respite from your busy city life. A large second bedroom is the prefect guest room, office or nursery. This intimate co-op has complimentary on-site laundry and common storage. Located at the crossroads of Greenwich Village, Chelsea and the Flatiron District, Union Square, the Meatpacking District, the West Village, Westside Market, Whole Foods and Trader Joes are minutes away. The F/M subway is a block away, the 1/2/3 and every other subway in the city are each blocks away. Michelin rated restaurants, fantastic shopping and entertainment are all right outside.

True three bedroom, two and a half bath condo in the heart of the Upper East Side has everything one could want and more! All bedrooms are spacious, sunny and quiet, and the wraparound kitchen boasts the full suite of stainless steel appliances and excellent storage and countertop space. The king-sized master bedroom has more than sufficient closet space, a private balcony and large en suite bath with double sinks and a deep soaking tub. Other hallmarks of this truly special east and west-facing home include washer/dryer units, central A/C, hardwood plank flooring and California closets throughout, beautiful built ins, private storage unit, and Waterworks fixtures in all bathrooms, including the powder room. Last, but certainly not least, there is a massive 530-SF private outdoor space with lovely greenery and custom lighting that has been turned into a mini playground, complete with a jungle gym, and tube slide from the upper to lower level, plus a garden and area for grilling and entertaining!

This pet-friendly boutique building in one of the City's most desirable school zones has a full-time doorman, bike room, and just two apartments per floor. Located close to the express 4/5 and 6 trains, plus the Q, everything you need is within a few blocks: a new Whole Foods and some of the neighborhood's best restaurants, museums, shopping, gyms and markets! Also available for rent for $12,000 per month for 1-2 years.

BACK ON THE MARKET! OPEN HOUSE THIS SUNDAY FROM 2-3! Make your appointment to view this spacious loft like studio at the Chelsea Mews! The main living area in Apartment 4H is a truly a treat with impressive high beamed ceilings, large windows, and incredible light. You'll feel right at home in this extra large space, which can easily fit all of your furniture - and you'll be amazed at just how much storage space this home has..

Next to the main closet you'll find a separate enclave that can easily fit a full or queen sized bed if you'd like to separate your sleeping area from your living space, or you can use this space as an extra large closet! You'll also find an extra loft space above this room, perfect for storage all of your possessions..

With a spacious kitchen with dishwasher, full sized appliances, pantry storage, and great prep space, as well as a large bathroom with medicine cabinet and vanity, you'll constantly be impressed at just how much storage space this studio apartment has..

The Chelsea Mews is a well-run cooperative that features a 24 hour doorman, elevator, laundry on every floor, and a gorgeous roof deck. Located right on 23rd Street in Chelsea, enjoy easy access to a plethora of subway lines, Trader Joe's, Madison Square Park, Whole Foods, as well as incredible shopping and dining. Apartment must be shown by appointment. Call or email to schedule your viewing today!.

*Furnished pictures from unit 5H in the building, showing you the ways to modernize the space. Actual photos of 4H are unfurnished.

Beautifully Remodeled Brookfield Colonial With Great Open Entertaining Space. Modern State Of The Art Eat In Kitchen, Large Formal Dining Room W/Coffered Ceiling, New Windows Doors, Siding, Roof Etc, Mid Block Perfectly Located In Great Neighborhood.

One of the most sought after buildings on the Upper West Side, Mayfair Towers is ideally located just steps from Central Park on the prestigious West 72nd Street block. Residence 3E offers top of the line designer finishes as well as an expansive 1-bedroom layout, which may easily accommodate a second bedroom, home office or den.



Redesigned to embrace an open living experience that effortlessly integrates the spacious living room and dining room - featuring a wall of over-sized windows - with the brand-new custom kitchen appointed with state of the art appliances - including stainless steel Frigidaire Professional 5-burner Gas Range, Oven, and Dishwasher, Fisher and Paykel ActiveSmart over-sized French Door Refrigerator and Freezer Drawer outfitted in matching custom millwork, Summit 34 bottle Wine Cooler - as well as ample storage including built-in pantry and corner cabinet lazy susan, and custom Quartz countertops, backsplash, and thick-slab waterfall island ideal for relaxed dining or entertaining.

The peaceful king-size master bedroom offers both an abundance of livable space for furniture as well as storage, with a massive walk-in closet designed by California Closets, and oversized windows, complete with custom blackout shades and a North East view onto the private courtyard and quintessential brownstone homes of the tree-lined 73rd Street.

Adjacent to the bedroom, the conveniently located and completely renovated bathroom tastefully tiled in white with a grey mosaic trim features Kohler stainless steel fixtures including rainfall showerhead and glass spa door, Toto Toilet, and mirrored deep-set linen closet.

The entire entry side of the residence efficiently provides a wall of closets, all designed by California Closets, with frosted glass paneling and automatic lights upon entry, including a laundry closet equipped with LG Washer and Dryer.

Lutron dimmable LED lighting and custom soffits were meticulously installed throughout the apartment, and the original hardwood floors were refinished and stained. The AC/Heating units with digital wall controls were also reconstructed and outfitted with custom unit covers.

An extraordinary roof terrace features breathtaking unobstructed views of Central Park to the East, and the Hudson River to the West. The full-service building amenities also include a 24-hour doorman and concierge, live-in super, fitness center, parking garage with valet, bike room, on-site dry-cleaning and tailor with additional washers and dryers on every floor, courtyard, and children's outdoor play area. Pied-a-terres and pets are welcome.

Move right in to this beautifully renovated, lovingly maintained two bedroom, two bathroom home in a prime full-service co-op. Apartment 2D has a gracious entry foyer with French doors that opens to the generously proportioned living room with a dining bay that accommodates a table for six. The renovated, windowed chef's kitchen features granite countertops, marble floors and backsplash, custom wood cabinetry and stainless steel appliances including double oven and a cooktop.

The master bedroom has two spacious, custom closets and a beautifully renovated marble bathroom, with fixtures and finishes of the highest quality, and a soaking tub. The second bedroom currently serves as a luxurious home office with double desks built-in and book shelves. The fully renovated second bathroom has a stall shower. The large hallway closet could be fitted with a washer/dryer that the building permits.

A wall of windows provides northern exposure with tree-lined views. White plank floors, sound system, custom closets, and through wall air conditioning completes this pristine home.

150 East 77th Street is a full service building, with 24-hour doorman and resident superintendent, a laundry room, storage and bike room, and a garage. The lobby and elevators were renovated recently and there is a beautiful private garden with seating off the lobby. The building is located in the heart of the Upper East Side, close to public transportation, Central Park, and the best the city has to offer in the way of museums, restaurants and shopping. 75% financing is permitted. Maintenance is low, even with a $126.94 month special assessment through December 2017. The building is pet friendly and allows pied-a-terres.

Soon To Be Fully Renovated 1 Bedroom Apt W/ Terrace In Freeport. The Apartment Will Include A Brand New Kitchen W/ Stainless Steel Appliances And Granite And A Renovated Bathroom. The Essex House is an iconic New York hotel / condo situated directly across from Central Park on Central Park South. This bright and large one bedroom apartment perched on the 31st floor is located in the coveted tower of the hotel. Its placement on a high floor allows abundant sunlight all day from its seven south-facing windows.

When you enter this apartment, you immediately notice the sunlight that pours in through the south-facing windows. The foyer leads to the living/dining area that features two walk-in closets and then enters into the large living space with an adjoining, windowed kitchen. The generously sized bedroom, features a large closet, and an en suite bathroom with soaking tub. This apartment also features original herringbone floors, dental crown molding, central heat/air, and overhead lighting.

Calling the Essex House home comes with many benefits. Surrounded by amazing shops, restaurants, and entertainment within Columbus Circle and Lincoln Square, and the very special Central Park. As a resident, you have access to all of the amenities of the hotel including valet laundry, dry cleaning, room service, maid's service, and a full time concierge team for condominium owners. Additionally, there is a health club, event space, and restaurant. The Essex House condominiums may be used as investments and be rented for minimum 1 month terms, with no board approval required.

Residence 21C is a stunning designer approximately 1300 square foot 2 bedroom, 2-bath home with open city views including Gramercy Park. Floor-to-ceiling windows flood the apartment with light from open south, east and west exposures. Enjoy glorious views of iconic buildings, such as the Empire State building, the Clock Tower and The New York Life building from this high floor home. This residence features 5" white oak wood floors, gorgeous open chef's kitchen with Island for added countertop space and entertaining, Bosch washer and dryer, Sub-Zero refrigerator, Miele gas cooktop and oven, Miele dishwasher and a 15-Bottle Wine Chiller. The master suite features a walk-in closet and a spa bath with soaking tub, separate shower and double sinks. Gramercy is one of Manhattan's most exciting and sought after neighborhoods. This full service building and luxurious home is conveniently located to transportation, Gramercy Park, Union Square Farmer's Market, Madison Square Park, shopping and incredible restaurants. Loaded with amenities, the gorgeous new development building, which is clad in timeless gray Indiana limestone, boasts a 24-hour concierge, resident manager, cold storage, state of the art fitness center, playroom, planted roof deck with barbeque and panoramic city views. Pet friendly! 421-Tax Abatement in place

This 801 square foot studio loft at 1 Seaport features luminous interiors by celebrated AD100 designer S. Russell Groves. Elegant floor-to-ceiling glass walls showcase unique six and a half foot wide horizontal picture windows designed to frame Southern views. Elevated 10'4 ceilings maximize the natural light and airiness in the space, while European oak flooring, custom architectural millwork and solid wood doors with satin nickel hardware bring warmth to the residence. The custom-designed open kitchen equipped with an integrated Gaggenau appliance package and generous island features Calacatta Gold marble illuminated backsplashes and countertops, walnut lower cabinetry with concealed pulls and upper cabinetry doors inventively clad in Calacatta Gold marble. The sophisticated master bath features Calacatta Gold marble floors and walls, a walnut vanity cabinet, glass enclosed shower and bespoke bath fittings in satin nickel with wood details designed by Groves & Co. A washer and dryer complete this smartly tailored residence.

The first all-glass residential tower at the Seaport, Manhattan's oldest new neighborhood, offers an unprecedented waterfront lifestyle with sky-high amenities and picture-postcard views. Directly overlooking the waterfront, the 60-story tower contains an exclusive offering of homes designed by Goldstein Hill & West Architects. The custom engineered glass walls dynamically reflect the hues of the sky and the river. Residents arrive home to the only private attended Porte Cochere at the Seaport, which leads to a two-story lobby with a 24-hour concierge. The Piano Nobile Lobby Lounge features a double-sided fireplace, dramatic lighting installation and waterside terrace. Two levels of amenities designed by Russell Groves overlook the river. Spanning the entire 30th floor, The Water Club is a restorative hydrotherapy circuit with a floating glass edged infinity pool, a digitally activated rain shower, a relaxation lounge and glass enclosed steam and sauna retreats all surrounded by the scenic landscape of the New York harbor and downtown Brooklyn. The sixth floor fitness center contains an extensive range of state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment with studios for spin, yoga and personal training. An exclusive partnership with FitLore offers each resident access to a fitness concierge, on-call spinning and training sessions and a la carte private culinary services. Adjacent to the fitness center is the SmartKids playroom, where technology and design create an immersive experience.

This 1,311 square foot, two-bedroom, two-bath residence at 1 Seaport features luminous interiors by celebrated AD100 designer S. Russell Groves. Elegant floor-to-ceiling glass walls showcase unique six and a half foot wide horizontal picture windows designed to frame magnificent views from three exposures. A 135 square foot balcony brings the incredible views one step closer. Inside, elevated 10'4 ceilings maximize the natural light and airiness in the space, while European oak flooring, custom architectural millwork and solid wood doors with satin nickel hardware bring warmth to the residence. The custom-designed open kitchen equipped with an integrated Gaggenau appliance package and island features Calacatta Gold marble illuminated backsplashes and countertops, walnut lower cabinetry with concealed pulls and upper cabinetry doors inventively clad in Calacatta Gold marble. The sophisticated master suite with generous walk-in-closet features a five-fixture master bath. A grey limestone feature wall stretches from the shower to the custom walnut vanity and mirror. A luxurious free-standing tub is positioned atop a slatted teak tub deck and brings a nautical nature to the bathing environment. Floors and walls are clad in Calacatta Gold marble and bespoke bath fittings in satin nickel with wood details have been designed by Groves & Co. A washer and dryer complete this smartly tailored residence.

The first all-glass residential tower at the Seaport, Manhattan's oldest new neighborhood, offers an unprecedented waterfront lifestyle with sky-high amenities and picture-postcard views. Directly overlooking the waterfront, the 60-story tower contains an exclusive offering of homes designed by Goldstein Hill & West Architects. The custom engineered glass walls dynamically reflect the hues of the sky and the river. Residents arrive home to the only private attended Porte Cochere at the Seaport, which leads to a two-story lobby with a 24-hour concierge. The Piano Nobile Lobby Lounge features a double-sided fireplace, dramatic lighting installation and waterside terrace. Two levels of amenities designed by Russell Groves overlook the river. Spanning the entire 30th floor, The Water Club is a restorative hydrotherapy circuit with a floating class edged infinity pool, a digitally activated rain shower, a relaxation lounge and glass enclosed steam and sauna retreats all surrounded by the scenic landscape of the New York harbor and downtown Brooklyn. The sixth floor fitness center contains an extensive range of state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment with studios for spin, yoga and personal training. An exclusive partnership with FitLore offers each resident access to a fitness concierge, on-call spinning and training sessions and a la carte private culinary services. Adjacent to the fitness center is the SmartKids playroom, where technology and design create an immersive experience.

Featuring 1,600 square feet of outdoor space split between a brand new roof deck and backyard, we invite you to the elevator townhouse, a brownstone originally built in 1910 and reimagined in 2017.The residence encompasses 6,900 square feet over 6 livable floors with 6 oversized bedrooms, en-suite marble baths with radiant heat, and walk-in closets in each. There are 2 wood burning fireplaces, steam room and an entertainment level wet bar.The generous proportions and design have an organized elegance that you might not find elsewhere. Incredibly high ceilings, and new windows with the original window shutters frame each bedroom. On the top floor, we have added a wall of southern windows which has a protected view, and is a wonderful game room. The brand new fifth floor leads up to a new glass bulkhead with additional storage in the vestibule to the roof deck.The open Chef's Kitchen is splendid in all four seasons as light emanates from the backyard on the garden level. Featuring double Sub-Zero refrigerators, white kitchen island, and windowed cabinets. The Wolf range and ventilated hood has an Artistic tile backsplash. Featuring a Miele dishwasher, and a dual function speed convection oven / micro, the island also doubles as a countertop architecturally designed for a casual dining. A folding wall of windows is easy to open to create an outdoor feel when dining in your eat-in kitchen.The renovation added 2,200 square feet to this home adding depth and height. There is new plumbing, 18 zone heating, 4 zone central AC, new sprinklers, new windows, and nothing has been left without careful consideration.

A perfect West Side Story! Welcome Home to this lovely spacious alcove studio (convertible one bedroom) just steps away from Lincoln Center, Central Park, and Riverside Park. Perched up high on the 25th floor, this pin drop quiet and sunshine filled living room (with an adjacent dining area together with room for home office) is an ideal space boasting four gigantic picture windows framing gorgeous blue skies. The sleeping alcove with dressing area offers a custom Murphy Bed and built in storage. The renovated kitchen with ample custom cabinetry, beautiful onyx granite countertops and premium appliances is perfect for bringing out your inner chef! Spacious closets (including a walk-in) and gleaming wood floors complete this residence. Here, in this prime Lincoln Square location, 160 West End Avenue enjoys 24 hour doorman, supremely attentive super, gym, dry cleaning, play room, laundry, bike storage, and access to Lincoln Towers own perfectly private park. Pet friendly too. Low maintenance includes gas & electricity! Walk to 1,2,3 subways and buses, shops, and terrific restaurants. You too can have your own perfect West Side Story.

11BC is a fabulous completely renovated combination offering three full bedrooms, 3 beautifully renovated full bathrooms, a gorgeous windowed gourmet kitchen, 3 spacious balconies, amazing closet space, white oak wood floors throughout, sun filled rooms facing North, South and East, private washer dryer all in this luxury full service building. On premises gym and pets allowed. Easy access to the subway, shopping, centrally located and a Trader Joes literally across the street. Don't miss this opportunity to upgrade your lifestyle.

LOCATION! LIGHT! Plenty of exposed brick archways and big timber beams invite you into this gracious one bedroom + home office loft on famed Duane Park. The large eastern windows look out over Tribeca's rooftops and take in the landmarked Western Union Building (1930) as well as FiDi's skyscrapers to the south. Wake up to bright morning light streaming into and filling this high-ceilinged home at the center of Tribeca. The Duane Park Lofts were built in 1881 as a coconut processing plant and converted to residences in 1981. The building features a lovely roof deck, bike room, and low monthly fees at one of the best addresses in the Tribeca West Historic District. Prime location, plenty of storage and in-unit W/D add to the convenience of landmark loft living at its best. Martin Scorsese and Isabella Rossellini both made 165 Duane Street their home - will you?

OPEN HOUSE BY APPOINTMENT, SUNDAY SEPTEMBER 24TH. Spacious, loft-like studio in the lovely full service Beekman Townhouse Condominium. Bright and open Eastern exposure allows plenty of natural light to flow into the apartment all day long. The apartment is large enough for a sleeping area, as well as living and dining areas. There is a separate dressing area with closet, plus an additional enormous walk-in closet, with custom built-ins. The building is located very close to Central Park, public transportation, fine shops and world class restaurants.

OPEN HOUSE IS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY!
PLEASE DO NOT JUST SHOW UP AT THE BUILDING!

Additional features of this gorgeous home include central air conditioning, new windows, washer/dryer, wine cooler, sound system and new solid oak floors.

165 West 91st Street is a rare prewar condo that offers a full-time doorman, resident manager, a fabulous landscaped roof garden, fitness room, bike room, a kid's playroom, plus a meticulously restored lobby with new bronze doors and cold storage. The building is close to the 1, 2 and 3 subway lines and half way between Riverside Park and Central Park. Plenty of restaurants, supermarkets and stores are close by.

Sprawling and splendid two bedroom, two bathroom unit located in Prospect Park South in a highly sought-after pre-war co-op building! This warm and inviting home begins in the magnificent living room with sunny southern exposure, beautiful parquet hardwood floors, and recently added recessed LED lighting. The adjacent enormous eat-in kitchen offers stainless appliances including dishwasher, quartz counter tops, and tons of cabinet storage. While you enjoy dinner, you'll adore the sunset views and lush trees from the large dining nook overlooking the historic Knickerbocker tennis club. Main bath and master bath both with windows were tastefully finished with bright and modern finishes. Welcome to charming 173 Hicks Street #5D, a prewar coop building in the heart of Brooklyn Heights. This well-maintained 1 bed/1 bath apartment defines simple living. The Apthorp is to New York City what the Pitti Palace is to Florence; a breathtaking icon steeped in architectural history and magnificent details. One of the few buildings in the city to sit on an entire city block, from 78th to 79th and Broadway to West End, it was added to the National Register of Historical Places in 1978. A large landscaped courtyard enables residents to drive through the porte-cochere, passed the guardhouse, and be dropped off inside the park-like privacy unlike any other residence in the city.

Incredible scale, history and exacting standards come together in this generous three bedroom with three full and one half bath fit for diplomats, celebrities and families alike. Twenty-four hour staff including full-time doorman, live-in superintendent and porters provide unrivaled service. The just completed renovation incorporated the finest materials and restoration of period details including custom baseboard and crown moldings, chevron pattern inlaid oak floors, eight foot solid core paneled doors, marble mantels, decorative ceilings and tasteful marble baths, central air-conditioning and private laundry.

Enter into a large foyer and be led into the ballroom-like living room with its high ceilings, decorative fireplace, huge windows and western exposure with incredible light pouring in throughout the day. Host events or intimate gatherings and make a seamless transition into your adjacent formal dining room large enough to comfortably seat twelve.

Chef's will delight in the perfectly appointed separate eat-in kitchen with custom cabinets, stone counters and stainless steel integrated appliances.

An enormous master suite with another decorative fireplace is so big will make you think you've moved to the suburbs. The second and third bedrooms are both extremely generous.

Beautiful 4 Bedroom 2.5 Bath Colonial. New Kitchen W/ Maple Cabinets, Granite Countertops, Ss Appliances , Crown Mouldings, Wood Floors , New Heating System.

BRAND NEW TO THE MARKET! This mint condition one bedroom (1BR) one bathroom, (1BT) loft-like residence in the thriving Financial District just off Broadway is waiting for you. Enter off the private keyed elevator to your south-facing living room with oversized doors and windows. The chef-inspired open kitchen boasts elegant white mocha mahogany cabinetry, Caesar stone countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. The spa-like bath is outfitted with marble floors and vanity tops, natural artisan-style travertine stone walls and a luxurious Kohler rain shower. The apartment also features wide oak flooring throughout, abundant closets, central air and a large laundry room. To top it all off, you have your very own private terrace with an open northern exposure perfect for entertaining and relaxing.

67 Liberty is an exclusive boutique building with a virtual doorman and a roof deck in the heart of Manhattan's fastest growing neighborhood. New commercial projects such as Brookfield Place and The Oculus at the World Trade Center have brought numerous luxury brands such as Saks Fifth Avenue, Hermes, Equinox, Apple, and many more just minutes away. In addition, many of New York's favorite dining destinations have recently opened in the flourishing area such as Eataly, Parm and Blue Ribbon Sushi Bar. Almost every major subway train at Fulton Street and the PATH is within 2 blocks of the building, making this location extremely accessible to any area of NYC.

Picture yourself opening your very own private keyed elevator door to your expansive 1246sf one bedroom, one and one-half bath loft. A rare find in the vibrant Financial District, it is situated on a quiet block steps away from all public transportation and amenities.

First time on the market, this high-ceilinged home has a wall of beautiful large windows that come with remote shades; a wall of brick in the living room giving it character and warmth, beautiful ambient recessed lighting, making this a state of the art residence.

Galley kitchen is complete with stainless steel Dacor dishwasher and oven, Miele refrigerator and a solid surface countertop. It is the perfect set-up for the chef who enjoys preparing meals and entertaining, providing open space and room. Master bath comes with heated floors, double sinks, separate shower and tub. Bedroom comes with custom designed closet and leads onto a private 249sf outdoor terrace, furnished with outdoor rattan patio furniture and a grill. The terrace has outdoor lighting. There is beautiful wood fence atop the terrace wall giving the feel that you are in your own backyard. This unique home gives you space, privacy and beauty. Virtual Doorman.

The Financial District connects to the best of downtown living through Oculus, Westfield Place and Seaport. Amazing eateries, retail and business springing up all over. You can get anywhere in Manhattan, Brooklyn and New Jersey through the hub steps away. Tenant pays $5775 in rent. Great investment property. Ideal for a 1031 exchange.

Situated on a quiet, cobblestone street in SoHo, 66 Crosby offers the best of downtown living. This co-op is a classic, cast-iron loft building that offers live/work occupancy. Apartment 6F is a sprawling loft of grand proportions with approximately 1690 square feet of interior space, high ceilings, an open layout with ample wall space for your art collection and dramatic, original columns. There is an abundance of natural light which enters from four, new, oak-framed windows.

This space has an open layout including a studio area, renovated bathroom, sleeping loft and a large walk-in closet. There are hardwood floors and an air handler installed for your central air. Soho Plaza Corp. is a well-run 6-story co-op with 32 units, an elevator, live-in super and storage. Each owner is given a 6' x 10' space in the sub-basement for private storage. The co-op maintains a substantial reserve fund for a co-op of this size.

This loft includes roof rights to build a private roof deck after receiving Board approval.

SoHo, short for "South of Houston" Street, is a historical district in lower Manhattan and famous for its original cast iron architecture in a 50-block artsy, eclectic neighborhood and international tourist attraction. This pulsating district in Manhattan is synonymous with its community, specialty boutiques and trendy shops, art and culinary experience, including the prestigious French Culinary Institute, boutique hotels, nightlife and everything in between.

BEST PRICED convertible 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment in the neighborhood offers amazing view (the gorgeous historic Jefferson Library building) with the oversized windows in both living room and master bedroom provide western exposure light all day. The windowed kitchen is also a rare find. This apartment is located in the heart of Greenwich Village and is in a full service doorman elevator building with the most friendly and caring staff. The building also provides garage, central laundry, and is pet friendly. Current assessment $220 per month (for 18 months) will cover a lot of upgrades like new sidewalks,and new water tower, etc. This apartment can only be shown by appointments, call today!. MAKE IT YOUR OWN!!!

South of main street Behind a row of Rhododendrons sits this magnificent offering. Featuring formal Living room with fireplace ,Den area, Chef's kitchen with top grade Viking appliances, Blue Pearl Granite counter tops. The Master is on the first floor with two guest ensuite bedrooms upstairs. The basement is finished with separate outside entrance to your own private office with full bath. Walk out back onto the mahogany deck overlooking the manicured landscape and full sized pool. There is also a two plus car attached garage that completes the package.

Approached by a long winding driveway off a quiet cul-de-sac, this magnificent Post Modern, 4,000 sq.ft. colonial in a private beach community offers seemingly endless views of rolling wooded hills. Like a mountain retreat, its gorgeous 2-acre grounds with emerald lawns, expansive flagstone patio and towering trees, creates an aura of peace and solitude. Completely rebuilt in 2009 with beautiful finishes and state-of-the-art amenities, this practically new home is ready for you to move right in. Entered through a charming foyer with elegant front door, fielded-panel wainscot, and lustrous hardwood floors that flow throughout the home, the open and airy floor plan allows for easy flow into the living room with fireplace, dining room, family room and fabulous gourmet eat-in kitchen with high-end everything. A huge breakfast area enjoys breathtaking, sunny vistas through glass walls and ceiling. A den, powder room and guest suite complete the main level. The second floor offers a palatial and luxurious master suite with cathedral ceiling and private deck with stairs to the yard; walk-in closets, and a lavish marble master bath free-standing tub and large shower; 3 spacious bedrooms plus a large designer bath. A full, partially finished, full basement provides ample space for entertaining, storage and more. Minutes away from multiple LIRR stops. LIE and Northern State nearby for easy commute. Low taxes!

Rare, sensational corner loft in Soho's sought-after Historic Cast Iron District. Impeccably architect-designed & flooded with natural light, beaming in from 16 oversized windows on 3 exposures! Sleek modern style melds with classic loft distinction in this awing 3 BR, 2.5 bath, 3,000+ sq ft home occupying the 4th floor of a fabulous 1877 Neo-Grec cast iron building. Savor open views of the grand architecture & luxury living afforded by the finest upscale finishes. A keyed elevator entrance spills into a dramatic south & east-facing great room for relaxing, dining & entertaining. Airy 11'+/- ceilings, walls of sunny double-hung windows, original timber columns & beautiful white-washed wide-plank hardwood floors lend warmth & character. The expansive loft layout offers tremendous possibilities for the use of space which is easily customizable to your needs. Serving the large living area is a superlative open chef's kitchen equipped with premium-grade Gaggenau & Smeg appliances, generous custom cabinetry, deep polished stone countertops, a center island & convenient pull-out pantry. The quiet eastern master suite oasis offers a dressing room with extensive closets & built-ins, and an elegant honed white Thassos marble spa bath with a custom double vanity, indulgent soaking tub & rain shower with Hans Grohe fittings. The equally peaceful 2nd BR faces north and features a separate study area, custom built-in desk, large fitted closets & an en-suite bath with a glass-enclosed shower. Other highlights include a lovely powder room for guests, multi-zone CAC, an extensive lighting system, washer-dryer, ceiling speakers in main rooms & a custom Savant A/V system for controlling audio, visual & lights from your smartphone. Nestled on the coveted corner of Grand & Wooster Streets, 70 Grand is a handsome historic building with a new automatic elevator, video intercom security & private locked basement storage. The location is exceptional amid downtown's best shops & restaurants, and public transportation right outside your door.

DEAL JUST FELL THROUGH! WOW PRICE - WOW HOUSE - Pristine fully Rebuilt 2005 South Salem Colonial exemplifies Country Living at its Best. Set on 2+ acres at the end of a Cul-de-Sac, this fenced-in custom 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath home offers a Mahogany Wrap-Around Deck, fenced in Yard perfect for play and entertaining with beautiful natural surround. MOVE IN READY!!!Lovingly Customized with Brazilian Cherry Floors throughout, Fabulous Master Bath with His and Hers Walk In Closets, Gourmet Kitchen with Eat in Dining leading to the Living/Great Room with Coffered Ceiling and stone Fireplace. A truly immaculate Colonial, this home even Boasts an Attached 4 Car Garage! Just like new, this clean and fresh home comes with a 1 Year Basic Home Guarantee for Appliances upon closing!

Sale May Be Subject To Term & Conditions Of An Offering Plan.Diamond, Completely Redone Jr 4 On The Pool Deck,Largest Terrace, Ocean Views, New Plumbing, New Electric,Custom Wood Doors, Wood Floors, New Bath, High End New Kitchen, Sonos Speakers System Throughout, Plantation Shutters,Crown Molding, Decorative Ceiling Fans, P/E To Beach. Dogs Allowed After 2nd Year.

This mint condition high floor NoHo loft has it all: incredible scale, floor to ceiling arched windows, fantastic light, high ceilings and beautiful hardwood floors. The current owner is an interior designer and just completed a top to bottom gut renovation with no surface untouched. The large open kitchen rivaling the finest restaurants features custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances and endless counters. Both bathrooms are brand new and find their inspiration in your favorite spa. A space so pure you won't want to change a thing, flexibility is yours to do what you want. 73 Bleecker has a full-time doorman Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 6 PM when you need them most. A private roof deck is the perfect place to dine al fresco or soak in the glorious sun. Convenience is brought to a whole new level with amazing restaurants and bars, fantastic shopping and myriad transportation options right outside. Located at the crossroads of SoHo, Greenwich Village and NoLita, Whole Foods and Dean and DeLuca are minutes from your front door

Enjoy a private, elegant lifestyle in this expansive 2 bedroom 2 bath Tribeca loft condominium with a fabulous apartment-wide terrace, a dream home blending luxury amenities with the convenient location you desire.
The gorgeous 25'-wide loft offers a modern airy ambience graced by 11' ceilings, light-filled oversized windows facing north & south, beautiful hardwood floors and refined finishes. A private keyed elevator opens directly into the unique space where a gracious foyer and excellent layout await you.
The generously-proportioned living/dining room is an inviting setting for entertaining, and provides versatility if you want to create a den, study/office or 3rd bedroom and still enjoy a large living area. The sleek open kitchen assures easy serving and inspires the chef with gorgeous wood cabinetry with some glass upper doors, honed granite countertops, a huge center island with storage and stainless steel appliances. Your peaceful master suite with a walk-in closet and upscale bath sits at the north side of the apartment, as does the 2nd bedroom that accesses the wonderful terrace spanning the entire width of the home. Plentiful closet space, a washer/dryer, central air and boutique living make the downtown allure complete.
Built in 1920, 73 Worth is an intimate, impeccably converted 7-story whitestone elevator building with 30 units, a 24-hour doorman/concierge and pet-friendly policy. The sought-after address between Church and Broadway is in prime Tribeca near a plethora of shops, restaurants and transportation options.

SALES GALLERY & MODEL RESIDENCE LOCATED AT 584 BROADWAY, SUITE 1210

This smartly designed one-bedroom, one-bath residence boasts a private terrace adjacent to the kitchen, extending your living experience from the inside out. The open living plan features white oak floors throughout, expansive windows and a concealed laundry closet with washer and dryer. The well-appointed kitchen is outfitted with Gaggenau appliances, a marble island with a custom oak bar top, accented by a rear pewter topped counter, marble backsplash, matte-white cabinetry and an integrated oak paneled refrigerator. The bathroom with a frameless glass enclosed shower is a sleek retreat finished with French vanilla marble and titanium Travertine walls and radiant heated floors, a custom floating elm vanity with Bianco drama marble countertop and sink with brushed-nickel fixtures and a dramatic custom backlit satin bronze and nickel framed mirror.

The curated collection of one to four bedroom residences at 75 Kenmare, born out of the collective vision of Lenny Kravitz's design firm, Kravitz Design, architect Andre Kikoski and developer DHA Capital, introduces the new look of luxury in heart of downtown Manhattan. An array of amenities are offered including a 24-hour attended lobby, landscaped courtyard, rooftop terrace, state-of-the art fitness center and underground automated parking garage. All of this in the heart of NoLita, a uniquely enigmatic and artistically charged neighborhood perched at the intersection of four distinct cultural epicenters ? SoHo, NoHo, the Lower East Side and Little Italy.
