Welcome to quintessential downtown loft living with this one bedroom, two baths TRIPLEX in highly sought after Greenwich Village bordering NoHo and SoHo.

This stunning home went through a major gut renovation in 2016. As you enter the apartment you are greeted with a brand new chef's kitchen with Sub Zero refrigerator, Wolf range, Bosch dishwasher, white lacquered cabinets, and quartz countertop with attached breakfast bar. There is also a full bathroom by the kitchen and brand new 7.5-inch wide oak hardwood floors throughout the apartment.

You then step down into the large open living and dining room which has soaring 15-foot ceilings, spectacular double height windows, and your very own private balcony, perfect for an evening glass of wine. The new one-of-a-kind, custom made industrial staircase leads up to a sizable and spacious home office overlooking the living room. Heading further up, you enter the bedroom which comfortably fits a king-sized bed and night stands. A brand new en-suite bathroom with double sink vanity and quartz countertop was also added, along with a dressing area with custom built-ins that offer plenty of storage.

77 Bleecker is a full service coop with 24-hour doorman, live-in superintendent, laundry on every other floor, and bicycle storage. It is surrounded by downtown's most popular neighborhoods with the finest in shops, restaurants, entertainment, and transportation with the 6, N/R, B/D/F/M lines just a short walk away. The building is also pet-friendly, accepts pied-a-terres, and co-purchases.

Gorgeous newly renovated large convertible 1brd studio. Bright and airy with large south facing windows. Brand new modernized kitchen, refurbished marble bathroom; dressing area and closets outfitted with customized cabinetry. You will enjoy panoramic views of the city and central park from the beautifully furnished and planted roof deck. Gallery House condo is in the heart of the best of midtown, only a few blocks from Central Park, Time Warner Center, Carnegie Hall, MOMA, Broadway and Fifth Avenue. Bus and subway service right out the door. This elegant building has a full time door man and concierge services. Don't miss this special condo; when you look out the window you will see "LOVE".

East Hampton Village Fringe new construction on 1.45 acres is this 6,900 sq. feet+/- on three levels with 6 bedrooms, 6.5 bathrooms and an attached 2-car garage. The first floor features an expansive living room with a soaring 19-ft ceiling height with a sleek linear fireplace. The kitchen has a beautful Calcutta quartzite center island and all high-end appliances. There is also a family room with fireplace and barn doors leading out to the formal living room, covered porch, mudroom, and a first floor master bedroom with vaulted ceilings. The second floor has a large laundry room, and an additional 3 bedrooms, all en-suite. The finished basement includes 2 bedrooms with a full bathroom, gym, media room and a bonus room. The backyard is well landscaped for privacy and has a gunite heated pool, and covered porch. Come see this newly built luxurious home close to both village and ocean beach.

Bright & Airy Corner Unit Which Is Located In The Desirable Inner Circle Of The Terrance. Beautiful Updated Kitchen W/Granite & S/S Appliances. Hi Hats Thru-Out, Gorgeous Hardwood Fls,*Storage Unit*. Community Offers 24 Hours Security, Country Club Olympic+Kiddie Pools, Beach Volleyball, Basketball Court, Play Ground, Dog Run. Close Distance To Lirr, Great Neck Schools.

This traditional two-story house in East Hampton South is located on Hook Pond and is next to Main Beach, with direct access to Hook Pond for kayak and paddle board enthusiasts. Completed in 2009, the first floor features a living room with fireplace, dining room with fireplace, den, master bedroom and bath, large country kitchen, powder room, laundry room and wide plank floors. The second floor includes three en-suite bedrooms and a second story sundeck. Delightful waterside brick patio with built in barbecue station. This 1.0 acre property has 107' water frontage, enjoys serene southeast views of Hook Pond, the dunes and the Maidstone golf course.

Located on one of the most coveted blocks downtown, situated in the epicenter of prime Nolita, and offering chic boutique eateries, all right in the nexus of Downtown Manhattan. This efficient two bedroom residence offers an exclusive outdoor open terrace that saturates the home all day and boasts western and northern light. The living room has deep set windows that provide a seamless experience of both exterior and interior living. The living room is complimented by a loft style kitchen that provides cool stone countertops and chef-level stainless steel appliances. This is an exclusive boutique full service building that is set apart by its phenomenal outdoor terrace, features a roof terrace, common storage, additional laundry facilities, a 24-hour attended lobby and resident manager. Currently there is an assessment in effect in the amount of $86 per month, for two years ending 2019. Located steps from SoHo, Tribeca, and the Lower East Side, The Royal Elizabeth is one of the few condominiums in the area that offers full-service along with access to some of the best venues, such as La Esquina, Lombardi's, and Apotheke.

Sunny one bedroom with a perfect mix of modern finishes and original pre-war details! This spacious and inviting apartment has been lovingly cared for and smartly updated. The expansive, bright, south facing living room provides plenty of space to relax or entertain. The massive eat-in kitchen with two exposures has been completely renovated with sleek modern finishes and an easy to keep clean design! Stainless appliances including counter depth French door refrigerator, dishwasher, gas range, wall oven, and microwave. An abundance of beautiful high gloss cabinetry including a pantry, storage drawers for pots and pans, pull out shelving, trash and recycling drawer, hidden GFI outlet in pantry to stow small appliances, and much more. Caesarstone countertops with an undermount sink, recessed lighting with dimmer, in-wall USB ports, and beautiful Envirocork flooring for added warmth, style, and comfort. The very large bedroom has two exposures and the windowed bathroom has neutral finishes. Hardwood floors, fresh paint throughout, four sizable closets, Legrande Adorne outlet system, two remote controlled ceiling fans, custom solar shades, and a large usable foyer complete this marvelous home!

This superbly maintained building has a live-in super and porter, two elevators, laundry, playroom, storage, bike storage, and allows cats and one dog up to 40 lbs (with board approval). Situated just two short blocks from Ditmas Park on Cortelyou Road, you're conveniently located near cafes, popular restaurants, year round Farmer's Market, and shopping. Nearest transportation includes Q,B,F,G trains, B68 to Park Slope and downtown Brooklyn, and express bus to Manhattan.

First open house is Sunday, September 17th 11:30-1:00!

Serene waterfront contemporary(Southport -Red Creek Location) tucked away within pristine landscaped grounds as you enter its grand foyer offers serene water views from the moment you walk into this bright and open floor plan with artfully designed skylights to capture light and water views at almost every angle with floor to ceiling windows and doors which lead out to wrap around deck -This inviting home is ready to welcome you featuring open floor plan, wood floors, chef's kitchen,4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms,( full 3500 sq. ft. unfinished lower level ) plus detached pool house and turbo Jacuzzi & hot tub . This ever changing peaceful jewel offers inspiration as you are surrounded by natures best ! Easy access to go paddle boarding,kayaking any watersport out to the beautiful peconic bay.

Hamptons Alternative! Modern Residence With Year-Round Water Views Of The Long Island Sound And Access To Short Beach. Stunning Modern Embellishments And Chic Decor Make This Lovely Home With Unique Floorplan An Exceptional Alternative To Hamptons Living Without The Traffic. Perfect For The Summer/Weekend Buyer And/Or Year-Round Resident. Access To Beach From Property!

Set on an ample .80 acre is this 4 bedroom, 3 bath one-level Contemporary home that is conveniently located only minutes to the village and ocean beaches. With all the bells and whistles of light-filled, open living spaces, a 20 x 50 heated pool, CAC, stone fireplace, completely renovated kitchen and bathrooms, and a nicely manicured back yard, this home is move-in ready and a great investment property!

Perfect location for to get to the LIRR, shops, restaurants, movie theatre, houses of worship. One bedroom Condo, eat in kitchen, full bath, and bedroom, AC, Patio door to open out to your deck. Laundry room, storage room, Parking on premises. Beautifully cared for complex.

Rego Park One Bedroom Co-Op With Private Terrace Overlooking The Interior Courtyard. Foyer With Dining Area, Renovated Kitchen With Granite Countertops And Glass Backsplash. Living Room Leads Out Onto The Oversized Private Terrace. Renovated Bathroom With Tiled Shower, Bedroom With Double Closet And Large Window. Doorman Elevator Building With Laundry And Parking (Wl).

**OCTOBER 15th -NOVEMBER 15th FREE ** AMORTIZED RENT REFLECTED**

**ULTRA-PRIME EAST VILLAGE** BEAUTIFUL GUT RENOVATED 4 BEDROOM/ 2 FULL BATH APARTMENT!**

Stunningly large Living Room, Plenty of charm with Exposed brick and HIGH CEILINGS! Spacious Bedrooms with closets and overhead STORAGE. Chefs kitchen featuring sleek Granite Countertop, DISHWASHER, ALL STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES and WASHER/DRYER in unit! Located in the heart of the East Village, close to the Astor Place subway stop, The Mermaid Inn, Frank, excellent Wine Bars, a short distance to Union Sq., Whole Foods and Trader Joes. Pet friendly. Please call for a private showing today.

Introducing 871 Park Place, a brand new high end rental building in Crown Heights. Located in a National Historic District, this tastefully renovated brownstone features eight luxury apartments ranging from two bedroom to four bedroom apartments. Each unit features gourmet kitchens equipped with Bertozzoni gas ranges and microwaves, stainless steel Blomberg refrigerators and dishwashers and Caeserstone countertops. Luxurious bathrooms boast Kohler toilets, Duravit bathtubs and Carrara Cheveron bathroom floors. Additionally every apartment has a Bosch washer and dryer, hardwood floors throughout, high ceilings and double paned windows. The building also has security cameras, video intercoms and private storage in the basement for every apartment. 871 Park Place is located on a quiet residential block between Nostrand and New York Avenues and in close proximity to transportation, the Brooklyn Children's Museum, Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Library and the infamous Prospect Park. Crown Heights is also known for some of the newest noteworthy restaurants, boutiques, and soon to be home to the newest location of Union Market. Immediate occupancy and easy approval. Pets and guarantors are welcome.Please visit www.871parkplace.com for more information!

Great opportunity to live in the heart of TriBeCa, in modern apartment, and at a great price! Tenant's need to relocate, so they are offering a beautiful kitchen table, flat screen TV in master bedroom, and terrace furniture to new tenant. This updated apartment at Independence Plaza offers in-unit washer/dryer, hardwood floors, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, an abundance of closet space, and views of One World Trade. Building amenities include full-time doorman, recently renovated lobby, gym, and children's playroom. Three blocks from the subway, Hudson River, Pier 25, and some of the best restaurants in TriBeCa.

Have a key to the park! Stunning south-facing two bedroom with two full baths on Gramercy Park in full-time doorman building with high ceilings, newly renovated open kitchen and beautiful hardwood floors. Flooded with light, this home features a gracious split bedroom layout ensuring maximum privacy. Your south-facing master bedroom has an ensuite bath and large walk-in closet. The large second bedroom is perfect for children, guests or a generous guest room. 7 Gramercy is perfectly located right on the park, Park Avenue South and all the amazing restaurants of Irving Place, Union Square and the Flatiron District. Madison Square, Eataly, Trader Joes, Whole Foods and any number of subways are within minutes of your front door.

LIGHT BRIGHT AND BEAUTIFUL 4 BEDROOM LOFT WITH 2 BATHROOMS. This is an amazing apartment in the heart of Hell's kitchen. Features include High Ceilings, an Open Kitchen with an Island bench, Full Sized Appliances, New Bathrooms, Hardwood Floors, and Large Floor to Ceiling Windows. 3 large bedrooms with a smaller 4th. Walking distance to Lincoln Center/Central Park/Chelsea and all Major Transportation. Available for Immediate move in. Pets Welcomed. NB Advertised rent is net effective with first month Free.

Large and renovated 2BDR/2BA with Modern Condo Finishes and a Balcony!
8-unit Elevator Building. Apartment features: full condo-style finishes, oversized windows, gourmet stainless steel kitchen, including dishwasher and microwave, granite countertops, and custom cherry wood cabinetry. 2 very spacious bedrooms and 2 modern marble tile bathrooms. Main bedroom can fit a king size set and has an on-suite bathroom with a soaking tub. Great closet space throughout, hardwood floors, high ceilings, W/D hook-ups.

Only 2 blocks to F/G train. Near all shopping and dining on Court Street and Smith Street.

Light filled corner 3200 square foot classic loft with 13 foot ceilings and 15 oversized 6 foot by 9 foot windows in 56 Crosby Street, a restored 1882 department store with original brick, bluestone and cast-iron facade. Full-time doorman in this intimate 9 unit condo building with key-locked elevators located on a quaint cobblestone street in the SoHo Cast Iron Historic District. Perfectly situated close to all the best that SoHo has to offer while maintaining privacy. Balthazar, Dean & Deluca, Equinox and Yoga Works, as well as great shopping are just of a few highlights.

Dramatic entrance into a 1,500 square foot sunny great room perfect for entertaining with five Corinthian cast iron columns, eleven enormous windows and a third full bath. Tucked away out of sight but open to the living room is a "Varenna" kitchen by Boffi which is fully equipped with Carrera marble island with separate sink built-in,Gaggenau stove, Subzero refrigerator, Bosch dishwasher, built-in wine cooler, cherry wood cabinetry, glass wire enclosed pantry and fantastic East light.

Two bedrooms both have ensuite baths and are so generously proportioned that each could be a master. The master bedroom is especially unusual. The two oversized windows have double closing wooden shutters opening onto a Parisian style view of other window boxes with flowers and shutters. Other features of this roomy bedroom include a spacious built out walk in closet, an Urban Archaeology master bath offering a 3 foot by 6 foot Kohler "Tea for Two" cast iron soaking tub with a handheld shower, a separate frameless glass shower, a double vanity with polished nickel base and Segny gold limestone floors.

The second bedroom again offers grand windows, another built out walk in closet and a full ensuite bath. Other features include large laundry/utility room, dual zoned central air conditioning, built-in speakers throughout the loft, including master bath.

Authentic loft in prime SoHo with great finishes!

This enormous & sun-drenched corner condo boasts 10 foot ceilings and floor to ceiling windows throughout. Featuring a sought after split 2 bedroom layout with 2 full baths and private terrace, this apartment boasts amazing city views, spacious living/dining room, and wide plank oak flooring throughout. The Master Suite has a large walk in closet, bathroom with double sinks. This luxurious unit also comes complete with an open kitchen featuring imported Italian cabinetry, Dornbracht fixtures, Sub- Zero and Bosch appliances, washer/dryer in unit.The seemingly endless building services and amenities start with a landscaped circular driveway with Porte Cochere, an attended parking garage, full time doorman and concierge, private storage, bicycle room, and cold storage for fresh food deliveries.The spa at ELEMENT features a 60' 3-lane lap pool, children's pool, whirlpool, massage and treatment room, saunas, fitness center, Yoga/Pilates studio, and indoor basketball and squash courts. Element has approximately 12,000 SF of outdoor space including its own great lawn, social lounge and sundeck. The children's playroom with adjoining outdoor playground is outfitted with toys and accessories from FAO Schwarz, weekly classes are hosted by Jodi's Gym. The resident lounge at ELEMENT features intimate seating areas, billiards table, flat screen TV, and kitchen area.

Unit comes partly furnished. Dining tableCoffee tableCustom made curtainsSofaThis south facing alcove studio apartment is the perfect fulfillment of every New York resident's dream ? ultimate closet space! At 533 square feet, it is also larger than other studios in the building. Sunlight streams in through a wall of floor to ceiling windows, permeating the entire space with a radiant glow. Fluid custom fitted drapery additionally enhances the vista. The alcove itself handily accommodates a queen sized bed as well as shelving for books and personal items. White oak hardwood flooring further captures the feeling of natural light and airiness that characterize this contemporary home. The enviable state of the art kitchen features gleaming white countertops and backsplashes of Silverstone quartz, imported Italian cabinetry with under cabinet recessed lighting, a Bertazzoni gas cooktop and oven in stainless steel, a Liebherr refrigerator, and a dishwasher that is virtually soundless. There is a generously proportioned bathroom with a floor to ceiling glass walk-in shower complete with handheld and rain-head shower fixtures, floating vanity, and imported Italian porcelain tile in shades of both graphite and sandstone. Other features include individually controlled central heating/cooling and a washer/dryer.

540 WEST is a new full-service 7 story boutique condominium with an elegant glass and steel façade. The building's unique design comprises 2 towers with a center 6,000 square foot landscaped courtyard perfect for lounging or nocturnal open air movie viewing, and additionally a lovely reflecting pool bridging the North and South wings. The step-down 24 hour attended lobby contains an intimate lounge and a fireplace. Other amenities include a fitness center, two artfully landscaped roof decks with BBQ grills, and multiple seating and dining areas, along with comfortable recliners perfect for sunning. There is also private storage, bike storage, and a pet spa. 540 WEST is located in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, one of the most dynamic and historic neighborhoods in New York City. Quaint brownstones and tree-lined streets abound and the area is populated with countless restaurants, cafes, and theatres, in addition to famed Times Square.

Take the 2nd Avenue Subway to this UES Sun flooded 1 BR gem at the Cherokee! The serene sixth floor (walk-up) unit has two (2) balconies, southern exposure and partial views of the East River and John Jay Park (complete with a lovely promenade/pool etc.). Updated kitchen with a dishwasher. Bedroom fit for a queen or perhaps a king-bed and new modern shower. And in the living area, custom wardrobe/closets, decorative fireplace and floor to ceiling windows. Enjoy the charming UES lifestyle in this chic cozy space and live in a historic, architecturally wondrous, beaux-arts, landmark cooperative. We invite: nonsmokers, guarantors and pied-à-terre. Convenient to the new 2nd Ave subway and the 6 train at 77th St, dining and shopping. On-site superintendent and welcoming staff. Rent includes utilities (electric, gas, water). Small pets are welcome. Large storage unit available for an additional $50.00 a month.

**RENOVATED LARGE TRUE 1BR/1BA in PRIME LONG ISLAND CITY**

Perfectly situated on 51st Ave, a very quiet and charming tree-lined street, just off the corner of Vernon Blvd. Only a short 1min walk to the Vernon/Jackson 7 train subway stop. Available immediately is a large 625+ square foot, 1br/1ba. This apartment has been recently renovated, exposed brick detail, updated kitchen and appliances, updated bathroom, offers a spacious living room, plenty of natural sunlight, windows in kitchen and living room, NO WINDOW IN THE BEDROOM, kitchen has room for a breakfast/dining table, 1 large closet in bedroom with ample space for clothes & storage.

Long Island City's waterfront neighborhood boasts peace and quiet away from the city noise, yet only 1 subway stop into Midtown Manhattan! 5-10min. Please contact me to see this great 1BR home, as well as my other studios, 1BR, 2BR, and PH's available. Available 7 days a week!

MADISON PARK TOWERNO FEENET EFFECTIVE RENT LISTEDTRUE ONE BEDROOMMadison Park Tower located at 49 East 34th Street is a 36 story rental tower with dramatic skyline views of the Empire State Building, East River and Manhattan, walking distance to major NYC attractions, dining, shopping, and easy access to the Herald Square & Grand Central Subway stations. There is a 24-hour attended lobby and studio, one and two bedroom apartments, cardio fitness room and laundry room.Apartments feature Oak hardwood floors, 9-11 ft ceilings, pre-installed solar shades, Bosch washer & dryer (in select apartments), and select residences with setback terraces.Kitchens are outfitted with stainless steel appliances, Italian custom cabinetry, a KitchenAid stove, Bosch microwave, Frigidaire refrigerator, and GE dishwasher.Marble Bathrooms are outfitted with stone countertops, glass tile backsplash, white marble tiles, and Kohler appliances.

Beautiful renovated 3 bedroom apartment available in Sunnyside. This 3 bedroom apartment is located on the 4th floor of a walkup building. Very bright apartment as there are windows in each room and its facing south. The kitchen includes a dishwasher and refinished cabinets .Conveniently located, only couple of blocks from the 7 train, a few minutes away from 61st 7 Express stop and the LIRR. Starbucks, eateries and shops are all in close vicinity. Call now for a private viewing. Pet Friendly and Guarantors allowed. Heat & Hot water are included in the rent. Pictures are of a similar unit.

Gut Renovation! Beautiful true 2 bedroom apartment available in Sunnyside. This 2 bedroom apartment is located on the 3th floor of a walk-up building. Very bright apartment as there are windows in each room. The sparkling clean has brand cabinets, marble countertop, new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and. Conveniently located, 2.5 blocks to the 7 train at 46th Bliss stop, a few minutes away from 61st 7 Express stop and the LIRR, There are so many Shops, Groceries, Starbucks and Restaurants in the neigborhood. Call now for a private viewing. Pet Friendly and Guarantors allowed. Heat & Hot water are included in the rent. (Pictures are of a similar unit)

Beautiful 1 Bedroom apartment in Sunnyside, Queens. Great amount of space. Great lighting and amazing city's views. New appliances. Walking distance to the 7 train station. Great neighborhood and great variety of restaurants right outside your door. For showings please contact Brian (347)-661-2229

AWESOME GUT RENOVATED STUDIO WITH FIREPLACE. FLEXIBLE LEASE TERM FROM 6 MONTHS TO 2 YEARS. You will fall in love with this apartment before you even open the door. Located in a small, well run building the SUPER QUIET apartment has 3 large windows that face SOUTH and let in lots of light. A separate kitchen has a great breakfast bar that opens to the large living room - featuring a working electric fireplace. High ceilings, Stunning floors, good storage and a beautiful Marble bathroom. Cats welcome. Furnished/unfurnished/semi furnished. The owner is agreeable to accommodate tenant. Laundry at front door.

GUARANTORS ACCEPTED

Conceived by SHoP Architects, handcrafted locally in the Brooklyn Navy Yard, and assembled on top of 11 subway lines, 461 Dean Street offers an unrivaled residential experience in immediate proximity to the new Pacific Park in Brooklyn. As the tallest modular building in the world, 461 Dean Street affords spacious layouts and near limitless views of Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Queens inherently unique to its modular construction.The residences at 461 Dean Street boast floor to ceiling windows, solar shades, wide plank walnut flooring, custom closet build-outs, and washers and dryers in each unit. Kitchens are outfitted with custom cabinetry, Caesarstone countertop and stone backsplash, stainless steel GE appliances, and integrated dishwashers and microwaves. Bathrooms are appointed with white quartz stone wall panels, polished chrome Grohe and Duravit fixtures, custom walnut medicine cabinetry, and wall hung Toto toilets.The robust amenity offering at 461 Dean Street is comprised of a sky lounge and rooftop terrace, state of the art fitness center, yoga, and dance studio, residents lounge with a catering kitchen and dedicated party room, a game room with billiards and ping-pong, and a children's playroom.At the nexus of Brooklyn's most vibrant neighborhoods is Pacific Park Brooklyn. With beautiful residences designed by industry leading architects, a brand new 8-acre park, Barclays Center and dynamic neighborhood shopping and dining right in your backyard, Pacific Park has something for everyone, just steps from the 2, 3, 4, 5, B, D, N, Q, R, C, G, trains.2 Months Free and 1 Month OP on 14 Month Lease for 1 Bedrooms1 Month Free and 1 Month OP on 13 Month Lease for Studios

Location.StreetIntersection: Bet N Basin Rd and 46th Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
**NO FEE + 1 MONTH FREE LUXURY 2BR ON LIC'S WATERFRONT**

Now available is a beautifully laid out 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom home on LIC's waterfront with stunning views from every room. Available immediately, NO FEE, 1ST MONTH FREE, for a 1-2 year lease option.

This split bedroom apartment features an open spacious layout, condo-like finishes, oversized windows, oak wood floors, entry foyer with large coat closet, a modern kitchen with black caesarstone countertops, white lacquer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, W/D in unit, ample closet space throughout, and South/West exposure with direct views of the Manhattan skyline. You will love the Master Bedroom which has large windows flooding the room with warm natural light, has 2 large closets, and a en-suite Master Bath with great storage space.

This full service luxury amenity towers is LEED-certified, pet friendly, and provides residents with the best amenities in the area. You'll have access to an amenity package consisting of 24-hour concierge, a package room, valet service, children's playroom, a high-tech fitness center, yoga room, a 50,000 square foot landscaped sun deck which includes a 2ft reflecting pool, BBQ & lounge area, beach volleyball court, 2 tennis courts, a great lawn, children's playground, a 1000-car parking garage, and retail on the ground floor. All of this located within steps from Gantry Plaza State Park. There are 3 dog parks in the area, brand new schools, 4 play grounds, and a variety of restaurants to choose from. Only 1 stop (and 5 min) on the 7 train from Grand Central. Building provides a free shuttle service to the Vernon/Jackson Ave. station in case you don't feel like walking. Also within walking distance of the E,M, & G trains.

Please contact me to schedule a private showing of this apt. I am available 7 days a week. **NO BROKER FEE. Prospective tenants will be subject to an application review and credit check through TF Cornerstone. $100/person**Gross rent is $4,390/month. Advertised rent is the net rent of $4,024, based 1st month free on a 12 month lease.

OCTOBER 1 or October 15 vacancy: This TWO BEDROOM Garden Duplex has 1.5 baths ,an open kitchen and LOFTLIKE main floor on one of the prettiest Boerum Hill blocks. The PARLOR floor is lovely with just enough low key/elegant detail and so much living and wall space. A super contemporary kitchen has a big cooking island and very nice cabinetry ;it's almost new as it was recently installed. The cabinetry is sharp +will exceed your expectations ! This is a super well designed space you'll enjoy with a couple of DINING areas to choose from and office area as well ! I love this fabulous " BIG " picture window that faces the garden. Bring in the light :-). The rental has a DISHWASHER and WASHER/DRYER in unit . Each bedroom downstairs has two windows ! The location is amazing. The heat and hot water are paid by the renter . One small pet on case by case basis.

1 BEDROOM GARDEN LEVEL APARTMEMT

Just released is this 1-Bedroom 1-Bath in the heart of Sunnyside.

The building is steps from many conveniences, a variety restaurants and cafes, and one block from Duane Reade and the entrance to 7 train, which makes a quick and easy commute into midtown Manhattan.

Heat and water included.

1 BEDROOM GARDEN LEVEL APARTMENT IN PRIME SUNNYSIDE LOCATION

Just released is this recently renovated & updated 1-Bedroom 1-Bath in the heart of Sunnyside with windows in every room, allowing for natural sunlight.

The bright windowed kitchen has updated stainless steel appliances and refinished cabinets, and an adjoining separate dining area or home office. The clean white tile bathroom also has a window, and has been refinished with brand new fixtures.

The building is steps from many conveniences, a variety restaurants and cafes, and one block from Duane Reade and the entrance to 7 train, which makes a quick and easy commute into midtown Manhattan.

Heat and water included.

** OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY, 9/24 12-1PM **RARELY available 4 BED- 3.5 BATH, Limestone Townhouse in Bay Ridge's prestigious and Historic "Doctors Row". This classic limestone represents timeless pre-war elegance and style. It includes details such as high ceilings, original, detailed woodwork and beautifully treated original hardwood floors throughout.This exquisite home features spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, a bear claw tub and an additional half-bath powder room off the Parlor level. Expansive sun-drenched living room with its staple Bay Windows facing out onto the serene front garden. Featuring a Library/Den room with deco fireplace, a massive eat-in kitchen with updated finishes. Intricately designed and meticulously upkept Presidential dining/family room with exquisite original woodwork, beamed ceilings, and an elegant decorative fireplace! Additional features include Central Air throughout, Sky-lights with original stained glass casings, Washer/dryer, and more.This original limestone townhouse is further accented by a beautifully landscaped front patio garden, and a serene, private backyard and garden! Tenant pays utilities.**Basement level with Private entrance floor legally permitted for Doctors office use. Available 900 sq ft windowed basement w/ high 8 ft ceilings with designated bath and small kitchenette. As an additional feature, upon Landlord final approval, Tenant may rent out the basement to a licensed Doctor and collect rent.** All the beauty, tranquility, and charming history of Brooklyn right at your door step! Bay Ridge features an array of cozy diners, spacious parks and laid-back bars. Close to 5th avenue shops, restaurants, and entertainment, this home is conveniently located around the corner from the 77th R Train Station and B4, B70, B63 bus stops. CALL/Text/Email TODAY to secure a viewing!

Beautiful 1 Bedroom Apartment located in the new LIC development 1QPS. Top notch amenities to make your life easier on a daily basis. Floor-to-Ceiling windows that provide the city skyline views you deserve with exposures to the East, West and South. Gorgeous kitchen with new appliances, new hardwood floors and washer and dryer in the unit. 3 Minute walk to the 7, N and/or W trains. 5 minutes train ride to the Manhattan.Amenities include:- Washer and Dryer in the unit- Dishwasher- Bike Room- Children's Playroom- Concierge- Gym- Laundry in Building- Live-in Super- Media Room- Package Room- Swimming Pool- Community Recreation Facilities- Smoke-free- OUTDOOR SPACE- Deck- Roof Deck- 24/h Doorman Call or Text for viewing.

Contemporary & Sunny 1 BR at the Impala CondomoniumHigh floor one bedroom apartment in the esteemed Impala Condominium. 15- B is a true one bedroom that is well sized and even better priced. Beautifully maintained. The apartment faces west and allows for plenty of light, while also being extremely quiet. The apartment additionally features a contemporary pass through kitchen with stone countertops and plenty of cabinets. The bathroom is tastefully adorned as well . The bedroom can comfortably fit a queen size bed and dressers. There is also a Bosch W/D in the apartment.
The Impala is a beautiful and contemporary 31-story building, designed by renowned architect, Michael Graves. The Impala has a concierge, a garage with valet parking, a health club, business center and conference room, newly renovated playroom, private cinema, and bicycle storage. This luxury building also features a 15,000-square foot sculpture garden. The Impala is situated in one of Manhattans most desirable locations on the Upper East Side. This luxury building is surrounded by excellent shopping, and restaurants, and is located just a short walk from John Jay Park, and the East River Esplanade.

AMAZING EXTRA LARGE LOFT LIKE ONE BEDROOM WITH 10' CEILINGS RIGHT OFF CPW AND 71ST STREET. The south facing living room is quite large and the bedroom has a large walk-in closet. The bathroom and kitchen have been renovated and the kitchen has a dishwasher. Large windows in both the living room and bedroom allow for great light. Note that this is a two floor walkup. The apartment is located in a beautiful well-kept brownstone just a half block from Central Park.

Conceived by Goldstein Hill and West Architects in tandem with renowned designer Mark Zeff, the residences at 365 Bond Street epitomize thoughtfully curated design, quality, and craftsmanship. The interior finishes accentuate the industrial casement-style windows overlooking the tranquil Gowanus Waterfront Park, tree-lined streets of Carroll Gardens, and the spectacular Manhattan skyline. Each residence features wide plank white oak hardwood floors, and Bosch washers and dryers. Kitchens include custom Italian kitchen cabinets with Quartz countertops and stainless steel Bosh appliances. Bathrooms are beautifully appointed with Kohler and Symmons fixtures.



365 Bond Street's all-inclusive suite of amenities, designed by landscape architect Weintraub Diaz and Mark Zeff, span an impressive 40,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor space.



With an abundance of outdoor space at 365 Bond, your urban oasis awaits. In addition to being surrounded by the new waterfront esplanade and park, 365 Bond provides a large scale interior garden courtyard, and a number of green rooftop terraces. 365 Bond offers the space and services for any occasion. Take a tranquil walk in the quiet interior courtyard; or gather with friends for a barbecue on the rooftop, while watching the sunset behind the Manhattan skyline. Maybe host a party in the game room or the gourmet kitchen and private dining room. Or just relax by the fireplace in the library.

NO FEE. NET EFFECTIVE RENT LISTED, GUARANTOR ACCEPTED, IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY. Designed for avant-garde living, 363 Bond Street brings everything you've come to expect in a luxury Brooklyn apartment to a neighborhood that's refreshingly unexpected. Your space to dwell where local art and local tastes converge. Our luxury Brooklyn apartments are outfitted with your comfort in mind with custom Italian designed kitchen cabinetry, quartz countertops and islands, BOSCH stainless steel appliances including gas range cooking, wide plank hardwood floors, washer/dryer, and Nest thermostats. When the sun's up, relax poolside at the Brooklyn Crush Rooftop Pool with sundeck and mural by Tristan Eaton. Head to Social by 363, our resident lounge complete with bar, fireplace, billiards and tech room. Visit the Green by 363 and entertain at one of the private barbeque cabanas, or simply relax and lay in the grass at our rooftop lawn. Stay healthy at 363 FIT with Precore machines, PELOTON spin bikes and free weights spread across 4,000 SF and centered at the Yoga Studio by 363. Named Brooklyn's new hot spot by Conde Nast Traveler, Gowanus has a distinctly industrial character and is home to the city's most mouthwatering eateries, avant-garde galleries, and innovative businesses. Walk its streets and discover the city's best Italian coffee, rock climbing walls, co-working spots, and the only Whole Foods Market in Brooklyn. Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train, which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood

Named Brooklyn's new hot spot by Conde Nast Traveler, Gowanus has a distinctly industrial character and is home to the city's most mouthwatering eateries, avant-garde galleries, and innovative businesses. Walk its streets and discover the city's best Italian coffee, rock climbing walls, co-working spots, and the only Whole Foods Market in Brooklyn. Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train, which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood.

This spacious, sunny one-bedroom rental apartment at The Hamilton off Second Avenue is a great place to call home. An entry foyer leads into the generously-sized living room with west-facing windows and hardwood floors. Integrating the highest quality design with innovative architecture and sophisticated elegance, the residences at Aurora surpass the expectations of even the most discerning tastes.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame impressive views of the city skyline and illuminate brilliant natural light throughout every room. Clean lines, white oak flooring and light, modern finishes unify both use and design.

Aurora's fluid living, kitchen and dining spaces are emphasized by white lacquer cabinetry, pure white quartz countertops, and a full height backsplash. Seamlessly paneled appliances featuring a Leibherr refrigerator, five-burner Bertazzoni range, and Bosch dishwasher set a new standard for rental residences in LIC.

Each bathroom offers premium Grohe and Toto fixtures with recessed lighting, and pure white quart stone and lacquer vanities. Select units feature glass enclosed showers.

An exclusive full-floor rooftop amenity space defined by soaring eighteen-foot full-height glass curtain walls. Aurora Sky Lounge is a continuation of the buildings modern architecture, featuring plush seating, high-definition television, Wi-Fi access, entertaining kitchenette, and a live edge dining table with seating for 10. The space extends out to Auroras Sky Deck, a beautifully landscaped, roof-top sun terrace complete with an outdoor grilling station, misting shower, chaise lounges, and intimate seating. This dramatic setting is perfect to take in the spectacular river and skyline views while relaxing or entertaining. Aurora Sky Fitness is a state-of-the-art fitness center offering free weights, high-tech cardio and strength training equipment from Life Fitness.

Additional amenities include: 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle and personal storage, laundry facilities, valet service, a package room, and on-site parking.

The apartment also has its own expansive recreation room equipped with 3 built-in TVs, surround sound, SubZero refrigerator, wine cooler, and Miele dishwasher, which connects to the well-appointed home gym, with Cybex weight training equipment, treadmill and elliptical machines; as well as its own full bathroom. The corner master bedroom suite has a large windowed walk-in closet, and an adjacent private sitting room, that can also be the perfect glamor room, and a large spa-like marble bathroom with double-sink vanity, separate WC, a glass-enclosed marble and polished nickel large rain shower, and separate whirlpool soaking tub. Other features include new sound-attenuating windows with UV coating to protect floors and artworks, each room has individual thermostatic temperature controls, smart home Crestron system, Lutron lighting control system, built-in sound system, and wired for home security cameras and a security alarm. White Oak hardwood floors throughout, crown & baseboard moldings throughout, Custom Nanz Polished Nickel Hardware and Waterworks Fixtures throughout. 200 E 84 is a full-service building offering 24-hour doorman and concierge, private garage, landscaped roof terrace with 360-degree views, laundry on every floor, and a bike room. The Hamilton is Yorkville's esteemed, luxury rental building comprised of one to three bedroom homes. The building features a grand two-story lobby with a 24-hour doorman and attended service entrance with package room and dry or cold grocery storage. The Hamilton offers their residences an array of amenities including a recreation lounge with kitchen facilities, business center, sky club penthouse lounge, children's indoor and outdoor playroom and two landscaped terraces. In addition are also available bike storage, dry cleaning valet, attended on-site garage and complimentary shuttlebus service to subway and shopping. With spanning views of Manhattan and the East River, residents will feel the pure serenity of the neighborhood. Located in a highly desired area, the building is convenient to many natural grocers including Whole Foods and Eli's Vinegar Factory, activity centers such as 92nd Street Y and the Asphalt Green Sports and Cultural Center, the Carl Schurz Park, as well as many reputable dining and lounge spots

LOCATION! LIGHT! Plenty of exposed brick archways and big timber beams invite you into this gracious one bedroom + home office loft on famed Duane Park. The large eastern windows look out over Tribeca's rooftops and take in the landmarked Western Union Building (1930) as well as FiDi's skyscrapers to the south. Wake up to bright morning light streaming into and filling this high-ceilinged home at the center of Tribeca. The Duane Park Lofts were built in 1881 as a coconut processing plant and converted to residences in 1981. The building features a lovely roof deck, bike room, and low monthly fees at one of the best addresses in the Tribeca West Historic District. Prime location, plenty of storage and in-unit W/D add to the convenience of landmark loft living at its best. Martin Scorsese and Isabella Rossellini both made 165 Duane Street their home - will you? AVAILABLE FOR NOVEMBER 1ST OCCUPANCY.
